description.value: The details of a health insurance product/plan

definition.value: The details of a health insurance product/plan

short.value: Valid time period for this product/plan
Identifies this product/plan across multiple systems

definition.value: Identifier for the product/plan that is used to identify the product/plan across multiple disparate systems.

short.value: Whether the product/plan's record is still in active use

definition.value: Whether the product/plan's record is still in active use.
A name associated with the product/plan (official name designated by the owner of the product/plan).

comment.value: If the name of a product/plan changes, consider putting the old name in the alias column so that it can still be located through searches.

requirements.value: Need to use the name as the label of the product/plan

short.value: Alternate names by which the product/plan is known

definition.value: A list of alternate names that the product/plan is known as, or was known as in the past.

comment.value: There are no dates associated with the alias/historic names, as this is not intended to track when names were used, but to assist in searching so that older names can still result in identifying the product/plan.

requirements.value:
Over time products/plans may go through many changes and may be known by different names to different users.
For searching knowing previous names that the product/plan was known by can be very useful.

comment.value: Products/plans may have multiple addresses with different uses or applicable periods. The use code home is not to be used.

requirements.value: May need to keep track of the product/plan's addresses for contacting, billing or reporting requirements.

short.value: Reference to organization that owns the product/plan

definition.value: The organization that "owns" this product/plan (typically a payer)

requirements.value: Need to specify the payor organization of this product/plan

short.value: Contact for the product/plan for a certain purpose

definition.value: Contact for the product/plan for a certain purpose.

short.value: Technical endpoints providing access to services operated for the product/plan

definition.value: Technical endpoints providing access to services operated for the product/plan.
